Uses of Interface
uk.ac.gla.terrier.applications.desktop.filehandling.FileOpener

Packages that use FileOpener
uk.ac.gla.terrier.applications.desktop.filehandling Provides the functionality of opening arbitrary files from the Java Swing-based desktop search application. 
 

Uses of FileOpener in uk.ac.gla.terrier.applications.desktop.filehandling
 

Classes in uk.ac.gla.terrier.applications.desktop.filehandling that implement FileOpener
 class AssociationFileOpener
          This class implements the interface FileOpener, using a properties file for storing the file associations.
 class MacOSXFileOpener
          This class implements the interface FileOpener, using /usr/bin/open to open documents that LaunchServices has associations for.
 class WindowsFileOpener
          This class implements the interface FileOpener for Windows, using native code and JNI to call the method ShellExecuteEx.
